name: RAG Search STJ Tool
description: AI Agent Tool for searching STJ jurisprudence via Qdrant vector store
author: Lex Intelligentia

ai_agent_tool_config.name: busca_jurisprudencia_stj
ai_agent_tool_config.description: Busca jurisprudencia relevante do STJ (sumulas e temas repetitivos) por similaridade semantica. Use antes de fundamentar a decisao para encontrar precedentes aplicaveis.

query.description: Descricao do caso ou questao juridica para buscar precedentes similares. Exemplo: 'contrato bancario juros abusivos capitalizacao'

integration_instructions.step_1: Import this tool into your n8n workflow
integration_instructions.step_2: Configure OpenAI API credentials for embedding generation
integration_instructions.step_3: Ensure Qdrant is running (docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose-qdrant.yml up -d)
integration_instructions.step_5: Add tool to AI Agent node as custom tool

workflow_integration.before_agent: Add RAG search subworkflow before each AI Agent
workflow_integration.merge_context: Append rag_context to system prompt or user message
